response.overview: A woman faces an uncertain future. She recounts her life in shorts, summaries, broad strokes, and seemingly disconnected episodes. One by one, the scars and bitterness left by a life of obligations, sacrifice, and scarce joy emerge inexorably. Díario del fin is a visceral, moving record; filled with liberating and brutally honest confessions, in which every sentence is permeated with a profound introspection and a clarity of perception that seem to surface only in extreme situations—those with no point of return.
response.title: Díario del fin
